00040 #include "OmniDriveKinematicsModel.h"
00041 #include "Pose2D.h"
00042 #include "Odometry.h"
00043 #include <cmath>
00044 
00045 OmniDriveKinematicsModel::OmniDriveKinematicsModel() {
00046 }
00047 
00048 OmniDriveKinematicsModel::OmniDriveKinematicsModel(const OmniDriveKinematicsModel& orig) {
00049 }
00050 
00051 OmniDriveKinematicsModel::~OmniDriveKinematicsModel() {
00052 }
00053 
00054 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convert(const double& x1, const double& y1, const double& theta, double& x2, double& y2, bool inverse) {
00055 
00056     double k = (inverse == true) ? 1 : -1;
00057 
00058     x2 = (x1 * cos(theta) + y1 * sin(theta)) * k;
00059     y2 = (y1 * cos(theta) - x1 * sin(theta)) * k;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convertToLocalReferenceFrame(const Odometry& globalFrame, Odometry& localFrame) {
00063 
00064     double locPosX = 0;
00065     double locPosY = 0;
00066 
00067     convert(globalFrame.getPose2D().getX(),
00068             globalFrame.getPose2D().getY(),
00069             globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(),
00070             locPosX,
00071             locPosY,
00072             true);
00073 
00074     double locVelX = 0;
00075     double locVelY = 0;
00076 
00077     convert(globalFrame.getTwist2D().getX(),
00078             globalFrame.getTwist2D().getY(),
00079             globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(),
00080             locVelX,
00081             locVelY,
00082             true);
00083 
00084     localFrame = Odometry(Pose2D(locPosX, locPosY, globalFrame.getPose2D().getTheta()),
00085             Twist2D(locVelX, locVelY, globalFrame.getTwist2D().getTheta()));
00086 }
00087 
00088 void OmniDriveKinematicsModel::convertToGlobalReferenceFrame(const Odometry& localFrame, Odometry& globalFrame) {
00089 
00090     double globPosX = 0;
00091     double globPosY = 0;
00092 
00093     convert(localFrame.getPose2D().getX(),
00094             localFrame.getPose2D().getY(),
00095             localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(),
00096             globPosX,
00097             globPosY,
00098             false);
00099 
00100     double globVelX = 0;
00101     double globVelY = 0;
00102 
00103     convert(localFrame.getTwist2D().getX(),
00104             localFrame.getTwist2D().getY(),
00105             localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta(),
00106             globVelX,
00107             globVelY,
00108             false);
00109 
00110     globalFrame = Odometry(Pose2D(globPosX, globPosY, localFrame.getPose2D().getTheta()),
00111             Twist2D(globVelX, globVelY, localFrame.getTwist2D().getTheta()));
00112 }
